title: Astros Fire Assistant General Manager Over Outburst
text:
The Houston Astros fired assistant general manager Brandon Taubman on Thursday, five days after he profanely taunted a group of female journalists in defense of the team’s employment of a pitcher with a domestic violence accusation in his past.

Taubman’s locker-room outburst late Saturday, following the Astros’ victory in the American League Championship Series, set off a firestorm that tarnished the first two games of the World Series earlier this week. The controversy intensified when the team accused a reporter of fabricating...
